Package jade.mtp.http

Class HTTPSocketFactory

java.lang.Object
jade.mtp.http.HTTPSocketFactory
public class HTTPSocketFactory extends Object
Singleton class for obtaining sockets. HTTP MTP calls methods use this class every time that a socket is needed.
Author:
Joan Ametller Esquerra
